text: aur kuchh aise log bhee hain , jinhonne masjid banaee isalie ki nuqasaan pahunchaen aur kufr karen aur isalie ki eemaanavaalon ke beech phoot daale aur us vyakti ke ghaat lagaane ka thikaana banaen, jo isase pahale allaah aur usake rasool se lad chuka hai. ve nishchay hee qasamen khaenge ki "hamane to bas achchha hee chaaha tha." kintu allaah gavaahee deta hai ki ve bilakul jhoothe hai
